slides.title: Notes on the Fly
slides.body:
Notes on the Fly is a mobile app that allows you to pass digital versions of paper notes to your recipient via text msg., email, facebook and twitter.

To send a note, choose from the stationery designs, write your message, and select a fold. The fold options will fold your note into shapes like a heart, star, airplane, origami figure, etc. Choose your recipient, delivery method, and then “flick” your note off of your phone.

Your recipient will receive a link that when clicked, will open a browser window and your note will “fly” into the screen. The recipient will be prompted to tap on the folded note and then it will unfold to reveal your message.
